One of the great things about Guardian Techs is that they can be used for anything technology related. Most commonly, Guardian Techs are called in to fix specific problems like spyware removal, virus problems, laptop repair, or pc repair, but after the customer gets familiar with the tech they often begin to use them for more basic tech support, computer training, teaching, or consulting.
